card.subTitle: Front-End
card.content: In the 7 years of my software engineering experience, I acquired special set of skills in React. Skills that make me a night mirror for bugs. I will look for the bugs and I will fix the bugs. <NotFromTaken/>

card.subTitle: Database
card.content: In every project I have been apart of I have wrote hundreds lines of data base querys, function and procedure. Experience = 7 years

card.subTitle: Back-End
card.content: Ever since the rise of Node JS, switching from PHP to to NodeJS made to possible to deploy rebust application. Experience = 7 years
